page.title: 17A Nuneatonian reflects...
page.content: I have lived in{Stockingford}since I was married 18 years ago. In that time, apart from new schools and several housing estates it hasn't changed very much. As far as{amenities}are concerned there has been little to improve the area at all, most of the changes taking place in the town centre! In fact speaking as a parent I think the lack of facilities in Stockingford is {pretty grim}as far as the children are concerned. On the other hand, the one good thing it does have going for it are the two new schools,{Croft}and {Glendale. I don't think pedestrians have been taken into account enough, especially the elderly, with far heavier traffic. We do have some good facilities in Nuneaton itself but on the whole I prefer Nuneaton as it was.
